entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 8 May 2023
